edu.ucla.sspace.matrix

Class SvdlibjDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.sspace.matrix.SvdlibjDriver

  • public class SvdlibjDriver
extends Object
    A wrapper around SVDLIBJ that allows Matrix objects and arbitrarily formatted matrix files to use the SVDLIBJ library. The SVDLIBJ library was written by Adrian Kuhn and David Erni and is a direct Java port of Doug Rohde's SVDLIBC library, which is itself a C port of the FORTRAN SVDPAKC code.
    Author:
    David Jurgens
    See Also:
    SVD

    • Method Detail

      • svd

        public static Matrix[] svd(Matrix m,
           int dimensions)
        Computes the SVD of the matrix.
        Parameters:
        m - the matrix to be decomposed
        dimensions - the number of singular values to return
        Returns:
        the decomposed matrices: U, S, VT in that order.

      • svd

        public static Matrix[] svd(File matrix,
           MatrixIO.Format format,
           int dimensions)
                    throws IOException
        Computes the SVD of the matrix in the provided file in the specified format.
        Parameters:
        matrix - the file containing the matrix to be decomposed
        format - the format of the data in the file
        dimensions - the number of singular values to return
        Returns:
        the decomposed matrices: U, S, VT in that order.
        Throws:
        IOException
